molecular.geometry.vector¶

molecular.geometry.vector(a, b, normed=False)[source]¶

Compute vector between two sets of points.

\[vector = a - b\]
Parameters

  • a (ArrayLike) – Cartesian coordinates.

  • b (ArrayLike) – Cartesian coordinates.

  • normed (bool) – Should the unit vector be computed? (Default: False)

Returns

Vector between a and b.

Return type

numpy.ndarray

molecular
